metadata.Title: CVE-2022-33972 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Incorrect calculation in microcode keying mechanism for some 3rd Generation Intel(R) Xeon(R) Scalable Processors may allow a privileged user to potentially enable information disclosure via local access.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-33972` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20230214.0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20230214.0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1').
